location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Sketch representing the rivers Naurab, Hermand and Shela, surrounding Zabul

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Manuscript; crayon and pencil on paperDimensions: 330 x 250mm

mods.abstract: The sketch represents the rivers Naurab, Hermand and Shela, surrounding Zabul. The sketch, in pencil and red and blue crayon, provides some place names and was produced to accompany reports of the floods occurred in 1939. The map is not dated and can be attributed to Maurice Patrick O'Connor Tandy, Vice-Consul at Zabul.
